FuncDef:
The access location-group command configures a location group and enters its view.
The undo access location-group command cancels the configuration.
By default, no location group is configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a location group.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 characters.

ExtraInfo: To configure a location group and enter its view on the vBRAS-UP, run the access location-group command. Then, you can bind physical interfaces to the location group.
